pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plotting and Average Theta Functions for Multiple Class Mixed Rasch Models // Provides supplemental functions for the 'mixRasch' package (Willse, 2014), https://cran.r-project.org/package=mixRasch/mixRasch.pdf including a plotting function to compare item parameters for multiple class models and a function that provides average theta values for each class in a mixture model.
